de.bpmnaftool.control
Class BpmnAfToolImplTest

java.lang.Object
  junit.framework.Assert
      junit.framework.TestCase
          de.bpmnaftool.control.BpmnAfToolImplTest
All Implemented Interfaces:
junit.framework.Test
public class BpmnAfToolImplTest
extends junit.framework.TestCase

High level system test for BpmnModel, AristaFlowModel and Transformation. Test data (XPDL files) are used, the output is compared to expected files (AristaFlow template files).

Author:
Felix Härer

testFile

private AristaFlowModel testFile(java.lang.String filename,
                                 boolean inputValid,
                                 java.lang.String[] flowObjects)
                          throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
Tests an input file and returns the transformed aristaFlowModel. The test consists of setting input, output, transformation, input validation check, basic input model test.

Parameters:
filename - input (xpdl) file to test
inputValid - set true if input is valid (test expects transformation to work)
flowObjects - array of flow objects which have to exist in the BpmnModel. Between two flow objects, a sequence flow is expected.
Returns:
the transformed AristaFlow model
Throws:
java.io.FileNotFoundException

outputFileCheck

private void outputFileCheck(java.io.File output,
                             java.io.File log)
deletes old result, checks if output is writable

Parameters:
output - output file
log - log file

testBpmnModel

private void testBpmnModel(java.lang.String[] flowObjects,
                           BpmnModel bpmnModel)
Basic test for a BMPN-Model where the existence of all objects with the names in flowObjects are checked. Sequence Flows between to subsequent flow objects are expected and checked.

Parameters:
flowObjects - array with names of flow objects that have to exist
bpmnModel - model to check

testAristaFlowModel

private void testAristaFlowModel(java.lang.String[] nodes,
                                 AristaFlowModel afModel)
Basic test for an AristaFlow-Model where the existence of all nodes with the names in nodes-array are checked. Control Edges between to subsequent nodes are expected and checked.

Parameters:
nodes - array with node names to check
afModel - model to check

compareResultToExpected

private boolean compareResultToExpected(java.lang.String filename)
                                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
Checks if a test result is equal to the expected one

Parameters:
filename - file name in expected and result directory to compare
Returns:
true if equal, false otherwise
Throws:
java.io.FileNotFoundException
